mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FLIGHTS (FLIGHTNUM, VIHICLEID, AIRLINENM, DEPPLANDTIME, ARRPLANDTIME, DEPAIRPORTNM, ARRAIRPORTNM, ECONOMYCHARGE, PRESTIGECHARGE) VALUES (PDT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{vihicleId}, #{airlineNm}, TO_DATE(#{depPlandTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI'), TO_DATE(#{arrPlandTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI'), #{depAirportNm}, #{arrAirportNm}, #{economyCharge}, #{prestigeCharge})
